Windlord::

"You're right..."sighed Windlord "we have two choices: one, try to 
find a place where rest and think about the others bot and plan what 
we can do. Two, and more risky, try to find out what other groups are 
in this planet..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "Let me get this straight, you've been here for as long as 
you can 
> remember, have met the new bots, and fought with them.  And you're 
asking me, 
> the bot with no memory, no idea where he is, and no idea who else 
is here, 
> what we should do?"  He looks at Windlord questioningly.
